iti44:2.3: Saupādisesā ca nibbānadhātu, anupādisesā ca nibbānadhātu.
iti44:3.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu arahaṁ hoti khīṇāsavo vusitavā katakaraṇīyo ohitabhāro anuppattasadattho parikkhīṇabhavasaṁyojano sammadaññāvimutto.
iti44:3.3: Tassa tiṭṭhanteva pañcindriyāni yesaṁ avighātattā manāpāmanāpaṁ paccanubhoti, sukhadukkhaṁ paṭisaṁvedeti.
iti44:4.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu arahaṁ hoti khīṇāsavo vusitavā katakaraṇīyo ohitabhāro anuppattasadattho parikkhīṇabhavasaṁyojano sammadaññāvimutto.
iti44:4.3: Tassa idheva, bhikkhave, sabbavedayitāni anabhinanditāni sīti bhavissanti.
iti44:7.1: Ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti.
